mentoringRequestForm.sendThisLinkFriend:
**Functional Purpose**: Introduces the private mentoring link feature
**UI Location**: Mentoring Request Form (direct mentoring section)
**When Users See This**: When viewing the mentoring request form
**Technical Context**: Standard text
**Current English**: "Send this link to a friend for private mentoring"
mentoringRequestForm.learnMore:
**Functional Purpose**: Link text to learn more about private mentoring
**UI Location**: Mentoring Request Form (direct mentoring section)
**When Users See This**: When viewing the mentoring request form
**Technical Context**: Standard text
**Current English**: "Learn more"
mentoringRequestForm.itsTimeToDeepen:
**Functional Purpose**: Heading for the mentoring request section
**UI Location**: Mentoring Request Form (main heading)
**When Users See This**: When opening the mentoring request form
**Technical Context**: Standard text
**Current English**: "It's time to deepen your knowledge."
mentoringRequestForm.submitMentoringRequ:
**Functional Purpose**: Button text to submit the mentoring request
**UI Location**: Mentoring Request Form (submit button)
**When Users See This**: After filling out the mentoring request form
**Technical Context**: Standard text
**Current English**: "Submit mentoring request"
mentoringRequestForm.openForMentor:
**Functional Purpose**: Explanation of the mentoring request process after submission
**UI Location**: Mentoring Request Form (explanation text below submit button)
**When Users See This**: When viewing the mentoring request form before submission
**Technical Context**: Includes a MedianWaitTime component; no special formatting
**Current English**: "Once you submit, your request will be open for a mentor to join and start providing feedback."
solutionCommentTextArea.howCanMentorHelp:
**Functional Purpose**: Label for the text area where the user describes how a mentor can help
**UI Location**: Mentoring Request Form (Solution Comment section, label)
**When Users See This**: When filling out the mentoring request form
**Technical Context**: Standard text
**Current English**: "How can a mentor help you with this solution?"
solutionCommentTextArea.giveMentorStarti:
**Functional Purpose**: Descriptive text providing instructions for the solution comment text area
**UI Location**: Mentoring Request Form (Solution Comment section, description)
**When Users See This**: When filling out the mentoring request form
**Technical Context**: Standard text; Markdown is permitted
**Current English**: "Give your mentor a starting point for the conversation. This will be your first comment during the session. Markdown is permitted."
